stanfordlogic.prover
Class ProofContext

java.lang.Object
  stanfordlogic.prover.ProofContext

public class ProofContext
extends java.lang.Object

A context in which proofs are made. In addition to the static knowledge that the reasoner uses (and which does not change proof by proof) the reasoner needs to deal with current knowledge, which is volatile.

NOTE: the proof debugging is not threadsafe!
